sentence.Network_en: Why, you are a regular cross - examiner!
sentence.Network_cn: 嗬哟, 你到是个地道的审判官哪!

sentence.Network_en: If you ever cross him, forget it, you're finished.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你曾经和他作对过，就别想了，你没戏了。

sentence.Network_en: The priest made the sign of the cross over him.
sentence.Network_cn: 神父在他上方画了个十字。

list.abs: The lawyer cross examined the witness and found that his information was all secondhand ., 律师仔细讯问了证人 , 发现他所讲的情况都不是亲眼看见的.
复杂而精细的关于交叉询问（Cross Examination）和证据开示（Discovery）制度，更是将英美法重视程序的独立功能的理念推向极至 …
cross education 交叉教育cross examination 严诘考试cross extension reflex 交叉伸展反射
He reserved the right to cross examine witness ., 他保留了对证人的交叉诘问权.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who questions a witness carefully (especially about testimony given earlier)
